name: Calculus I
description: This course covers the fundamental concepts of differential and integral calculus.
summary: Learn how to solve problems in calculus, including limits, derivatives, and integrals.
requirement: A good understanding of algebra is required.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: This course covers the principles of organic chemistry, including the properties and reactions of organic compounds.
summary: Learn how to identify and classify organic compounds, and understand their properties and reactions.
requirement: A good understanding of general chemistry is required.

name: Introduction to Quantum Mechanics
description: This course provides an introduction to the principles of quantum mechanics and their applications.
summary: Learn about the fundamental concepts of quantum mechanics, including wave-particle duality, uncertainty principle, and quantum states.
requirement: A good understanding of calculus and physics is required.

name: Introduction to Graphic Design
description: This course provides an introduction to the principles of graphic design and their applications.
summary: Learn about the fundamental elements of graphic design, including typography, color theory, and layout.

name: Video Editing with Adobe Premiere Pro
description: This course provides an introduction to the Adobe Premiere Pro video editing software and its use in creating professional-quality videos.
summary: Learn how to use Adobe Premiere Pro to edit and enhance your videos, including adding effects, transitions, and audio.
requirement: No prior experience is required, but basic computer skills are recommended.

name: Introduction to HTML
description: This course provides an introduction to HTML and its use in creating web pages.
summary: Learn the basics of HTML, including tags, attributes, and document structure.

name: English Language for Beginners
description: This course provides an introduction to the English language for beginners.
summary: Learn the basics of the English language, including grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation.
